thread.title: Two couples - one night after the Westminster tragedy !
thread.title_full: Two couples - one night after the Westminster tragedy ! - Review of Premier Inn London Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: christopher s
title: Two couples - one night after the Westminster tragedy !
text:
We found this brand new Premier Inn on their website that highlights new builds / locations etc
Marvellous central location with very close proximity to underground - not too easy to find first off but straightforward when found. Great design , A1 security , high standards , accommodating team members on front desk & breakfast service.
No parking & not easy to get car to the front of the hotel but easy access from drop off access on high street. Proximity to Borough market itself - exceptional.
Value for money in London - good. Value for money in the real world - not so good but still very competitive in the overall mid market hotel sector as the quality Premier Inn offering continues to exceed expectations.
If you need English breakfast - no problem @ all & don't be shy on asking for more etc
Worth trying out if in the district
